workflow.name: Create AI UGC videos from Telegram voice notes using OpenAI & HeyGen
workflow.description:
## Description¬†
Turn Telegram voice messages into AI-generated videos and send the video link back to the chat. This workflow listens for messages, downloads the file, transcribes the audio, generates a video via HeyGen, and returns the final URL. Fast, automated UGC creation right inside Telegram. ‚ú®

## What This Template Does¬†
- Listens for new Telegram messages and triggers the flow.
- Downloads attached files (e.g., voice memos).
- Transcribes the voice memo to text.
- Generates a video via HeyGen using the transcription.
- Polls HeyGen for video status, waits with a short buffer, and sends the final video URL back.

## Key Benefits¬†
- Automates UGC creation from Telegram messages ‚ö°
- Reduces manual steps from file handling to final video delivery üß©
- Keeps users in Telegram for a smooth, chat-native experience üì≤
- Modular nodes make it easy to customize or extend üîß

## Features¬†
- Telegram message trigger and message updates üõéÔ∏è
- File download and retrieval for processing üì•
- Voice transcription step for audio-to-text üéôÔ∏è‚û°Ô∏èüìù
- HeyGen video generation via POST and status checks via GET üåê
- 10-second buffer to allow external processing ‚è±Ô∏è
- Automatic return of the video URL to the chat üîó

## Requirements¬†
- n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted) ‚öôÔ∏è
- Telegram Bot credentials configured in n8n (to receive messages and send replies) ü§ñ
- HeyGen API key for:
- POST https://api.heygen.com/v2/video/generate
- GET https://api.heygen.com/v1/video_status.get
- A transcription step configured in n8n for converting voice memos to text (node present in this workflow) üó£üìù

## Target Audience¬†
- Teams creating AI UGC directly from chat workflows üì¢
- Marketing and social teams capturing quick briefs via voice üßë
- Agencies standardizing UGC production pipelines üè¢
- Ops and support teams needing rapid content responses üöÄ

## Step-by-Step Setup Instructions (Concise)¬†
- Connect Telegram Bot credentials in n8n and select the chat/channel for Message Trigger ü§ù
- Add your HeyGen API key in n8n Credentials and map it in the HTTP Request nodes üîë
- Ensure the transcription node is configured to convert audio to text and map output to video generation üß≠
- Import the workflow, assign credentials to all nodes, and replace any placeholders üß©
- Run once to test end-to-end; adjust the 10s buffer if videos take longer ‚è≥

workflow.name: Create AI UGC Videos from Telegram with HeyGen

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
